mapper.select: SELECT round(AVG (score), 1) as scoreAvg, round(AVG (staff*2.5), 1) as staffAvg, round(AVG (service*2.5), 1) as serviceAvg, round(AVG (cleanness*2.5), 1) as cleannessAvg, round(AVG (comfort*2.5), 1) as comfortAvg, round(AVG (effectiveness*2.5), 1) as effectivenessAvg, round(AVG (place*2.5), 1) as placeAvg FROM review WHERE serialnumber = #{serialnumber}
